text:
The Batik transcoder leaves non-daemon threads running after it's finished.

These three threads are running (I made toString() on the threads):

Thread[AWT-Windows,6,main]
Thread[Thread-2,5,main]
Thread[Thread-3,5,main]
creator: mikael.staldal@home.se

text:
Since we use the JDK AWT Toolkit there is nothing we can do to avoid
starting the AWT event thread.  Using 1.4 headless mode may solve this
for you, but it is a JDK issue not a Batik issue.
creator: deweese@apache.org
deweese@apache.org
text: We now fully support JDK 1.4 headless mode.
